name: Dark Labyrinth (GalaxyVinci05)
description:
A 2D puzzle game made for Trijam #204! The theme was "Blocked"

In this game you're blocked in a labyrinth inside a haunted house, and need to somehow escape.
Rotate the map in order to move around, and collect all 4 coins to exit the labyrinth. But don't hit the spikes!

Controls:
A and D or arrow keys to rotate the map left and right
Hold Space to rotate faster

Credits:
Default Track:
VGMusicRox - Frantic Factory (by Grant Kirkhope)
Dubstep Track:
Lavender Town Haunting (Dubstep remix)
